alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 3:33AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet. Snow showers today will increase and become heavy this afternoon and tonight. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with up to 12 inches over the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from noon Today to 6 AM Wednesday: Payson 4 to 6 inches Pine-Strawberry 8 to 12 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
